CustomField.description: This give the date part od Departure Date Time files as a date data type.. Can be used as filter in queries
CustomField.formula: DATEVALUE( MID( Departure_Date_Time__c , 7,4)+"-"+MID( Departure_Date_Time__c , 4,2) + "-" + MID( Departure_Date_Time__c , 1,2) )
CustomField.label: Train Departure_Date
